name: Caveclan
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Once in a while a new mission pops up.

  1. CLICK on a caveman to assign him to the mission.
  2. DRAG the supplies from your Armory window to the Mission window. The item types (weapon, armor, food, fun) correspond to the FOUR slots in the bottom left of the mission window.
  3. If you're happy with the success chance, click on 'Send off'. Make sure to pay attention to the season, mission requirements, and the preferences of your caveman!

WARNING: THIS IS A PROTOTYPE. THIS GAME HAS BEEN MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR THE /R/WEBGAMES GAME JAM!

Caveclan is a resource management game, where you're the commander of a ragtag bunch of cavemen. Send out your cavemen on missions to hunt mammoths, steal the wings off of a pterodactyl, or raid nearby caveclans and steal their supplies!

TIPS:
There are a couple of modifiers for a mission's success chance

Weapons

Against buzzards, bows are better. Against boars, spears are better, and against mammoths slings are better.

Armor
Against buzzards, leather is better. Against boars, bronze is better. And against mammoths, fur is better.

Also it's better to wear fur in the winter, and cloth in the summer.

Food
Food is only connected to the season. In the winter it's better to supply your men with mammoth meat, and in the summer it's better to use buzzard bits. Boar core is the neutral option.
